alert.note: Alert for Kootenai, Cabinet Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 2:57PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Flathead County through 330 PM MDT... At 256 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles west of Kalispell, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 30 mph, pea size hail, and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marion. This includes Highway 2 between mile markers 98 and 103. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
